price: 57. Par Allah, j’userai d’un stratagème contre vos idoles, quand vous aurez le dos tourné. »
arabic: وَتَٱللَّهِ لَأَكِيدَنَّ أَصۡنَٰمَكُم بَعۡدَ أَن تُوَلُّواْ مُدۡبِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: watal-lahi la-akīdanna aṣnāmakum baʿda an tuwallū mud'birīna
